metadata.subject: Markets
metadata.title: Lettres patentes du roi, portant établissement d'un marché à Villepreux : données à Versailles au mois d'avril 1785 : registrées en Parlement le dix mai mil sept cent quatre-vingt-cinq

metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title and cover are combined. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages. Skewed text. The text on the back cover is upside-down.
